DOC.detailed_description: The investigator evaluate efficacy safety transbronchial lung biopsy ( TBLB ) bronchial brush use electromagnetic navigation bronchoscopy ( ENB ) guide sheath ( GS ) diagnosis peripheral pulmonary lesion ( PPLs ) radiographic fluoroscopy.The study design two-center prospective randomize controlled trial . The participate center Department pulmonary medicine endoscope department , Shanghai chest Hospital affiliate Shanghai JiaoTong University , China . Department pulmonary medicine , Shanghai ZhongShan Hospitial affiliate Shanghai FuDan University , China.Patients divide two group , ENB-GS-TBLB-X-ray group GS-TBLB-X-ray group.Each subject randomize group.The study expect enroll 60 patient 2 center ( Shanghai Chest Hospital : 40 , Shanghai Zhongshan Hospital : 20 ) .
